activation.reactionTrigger: When a creature would drop you to 0 hit points

system.description:
Requirement: 11th level

When a creature would drop you to 0 hit points, you can use your reaction to make an unarmed strike against any enemy within your reach. On a hit, you can spend 1 exertion to roll your martial arts die and gain that many temporary hit points. You canâ€™t use this feature again until you finish a short or long rest.
